attributes.additional_details:
Ban aid to any country overseas until we clear the deficit of this country and to countries proven to be training grounds for Islamic terrorists.
Being out in these countries isn't working in stopping terrorism, instead we're putting the lives of British people working overseas in embassies and our military in war zones and Islamic countries at risk. It's time to look after our own country and stop giving money to countries that participate in attacks on UK nationals globally.
The government must listen to us and our elected representatives and debate this properly
